# Module Checklist Template

Use this checklist to verify every module is production-ready.

---

## Module: [MODULE_NAME]
**Course:** [COURSE_NAME]
**Reviewer:** [NAME]
**Date:** [DATE]

---

## 1. Required Files

| File | Present | Complete | Notes |
|------|---------|----------|-------|
| README.md | [ ] | [ ] | Module overview, learning objectives |
| lesson.md | [ ] | [ ] | Main content (2000-5000 words) |
| exercises.md | [ ] | [ ] | Hands-on practice activities |
| quiz.md | [ ] | [ ] | 10+ assessment questions |
| SOLUTIONS.md | [ ] | [ ] | Complete exercise solutions |
| QUIZ-ANSWERS.md | [ ] | [ ] | Quiz answer key with explanations |

---

## 2. Content Quality

### Learning Objectives
- [ ] 3-5 clear, measurable objectives stated
- [ ] Objectives use action verbs (Bloom's taxonomy)
- [ ] Objectives are achievable within module time

### Main Content
- [ ] Content covers all learning objectives
- [ ] Logical flow and organization
- [ ] Appropriate depth for target audience
- [ ] No placeholder/TODO content
- [ ] Technical accuracy verified

### Code Examples
- [ ] All code examples tested and working
- [ ] Code is properly formatted with syntax highlighting
- [ ] Comments explain key concepts
- [ ] Copy-paste ready (no hidden characters)
- [ ] Language/framework versions specified

### Visual Elements
- [ ] Screenshots are current and clear
- [ ] Diagrams are readable and labeled
- [ ] Images have alt text (accessibility)
- [ ] File sizes optimized (<500KB each)

---

## 3. Exercises

- [ ] At least 3 practical exercises
- [ ] Progressive difficulty (easy → hard)
- [ ] Clear instructions
- [ ] Expected outcomes stated
- [ ] Time estimates provided
- [ ] Complete solutions available

---

## 4. Assessment

### Quiz Questions
- [ ] Minimum 10 questions
- [ ] Mix of question types (multiple choice, true/false, short answer)
- [ ] Questions test learning objectives
- [ ] Clear, unambiguous wording
- [ ] Answer key with explanations

---

## 5. Technical Validation

### Links
- [ ] All internal links work
- [ ] All external links work
- [ ] No broken image references

### Formatting
- [ ] Consistent markdown formatting
- [ ] Proper heading hierarchy (H1 → H2 → H3)
- [ ] Code blocks properly fenced
- [ ] Tables render correctly
- [ ] No rendering issues

### Language
- [ ] Spell check passed
- [ ] Grammar check passed
- [ ] Consistent terminology
- [ ] Appropriate reading level
- [ ] Language matches course (e.g., Spanish for FPUNA)

---

## 6. Metadata

- [ ] Estimated completion time stated
- [ ] Prerequisites clearly listed
- [ ] Module number/sequence correct
- [ ] Last updated date accurate

---

## Verification Summary

| Category | Status | Score |
|----------|--------|-------|
| Required Files | [ ] Pass / [ ] Fail | /6 |
| Content Quality | [ ] Pass / [ ] Fail | /5 |
| Exercises | [ ] Pass / [ ] Fail | /6 |
| Assessment | [ ] Pass / [ ] Fail | /5 |
| Technical | [ ] Pass / [ ] Fail | /9 |
| Metadata | [ ] Pass / [ ] Fail | /4 |
| **TOTAL** | | /35 |

**Minimum passing score:** 30/35
